definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: New progress has been made in improving Party conduct, promoting integrity and combating corruption.
sentences.chinese: 党风廉政建设和反腐败斗争取得新成效。

sentences.english: But his anti-corruption law and an ethics task-force did not go far enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的反腐败法和道德工作推动力远远还不够。

sentences.english: We will strengthen our efforts to promote clean government and combat corruption.
sentences.chinese: 加强廉政建设和反腐败工作。

sentences.english: The agency also supports efforts to fight trafficking in persons and corruption.
sentences.chinese: 该署还支持打击人口贩运及反腐败的工作。

sentences.english: We will make investigating and prosecuting major violations of the law and discipline an important task in the ?ght against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 要把查处违法违纪大案要案，作为反腐败的重要任务。

sentences.english: Hundreds of governance and anti-corruption activities take place throughout the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: 世行开展了大量治理和反腐败工作。

sentences.english: The IACC's theme this year is "Restoring Trust."
sentences.chinese: 今年国际反腐败大会的主题是“恢复信任”。

sentences.english: Our party has realized two major transitions in the anti-corruption work since the CPC Sixteenth National Congress.
sentences.chinese: 十六大以来我们党在反腐败工作中实现了两大转变。

sentences.english: Can effectively restrict the authority, is the essential link for counter-corruption.
sentences.chinese: 能不能有效地制约权力，是反腐败的关键环节。

sentences.english: The system anti-corruption is the correct road to break away from the present predicament.
sentences.chinese: 制度反腐败，才是摆脱当前困境的正确道路。

sentences.english: The students are crusading against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 学生们正在参加反腐败运动。

sentences.english: Anti-corruption is related to the party and the country's survival.
sentences.chinese: 反腐败关系党和国家的生死存亡。

sentences.english: We will make investigating and prosecuting major violations of the law and discipline an important task in the fight against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 要把查处违法违纪大案要案，作为反腐败的重要任务。

sentences.english: Grasping the work of fulfilling the legal systems is the key link of anti-corruption struggle.
sentences.chinese: 抓好法律制度的落实工作是反腐败斗争的关键一环。

sentences.english: Leader cadre is clean-fingered self-discipline is anti-corruption the key that beats a fight and essential.
sentences.chinese: 领导干部廉洁自律是反腐败斗争的关键和根本。

sentences.english: The system of the masses supervision is one of the important means of the anti-corruption.
sentences.chinese: 群众监督体制是反腐败的重要手段之一。

definition: to fight corruption and advocate probity
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (CCDI), organization within the CCP which investigates corruption and other wrongdoing among Party cadres/abbr. for 中共中央紀律檢查委員會|中共中央纪律检查委员会
to rule according to the law
